Air modifiers: 115% vs. Light Aircraft and Heavy Aircraft
Ability: Warped in from a portal that lasts for 2700 frames (180 in-game seconds)
The duration can be extended by possessingTech Machine shops
The Kingsnake is automatically replaced 150 ~ 240 frames (10 ~ 16 in-game seconds) after it is destroyed
The Kingsnake is lost when the portal closes
Notes: Can only be deployed in a radius of 18 around the Experimental Warpshop or a radius of 9 around aWarpnode
Has 2 ammunitionThe ammunition is shared by both the missiles and the laser gunsEach ammunition takes 60 frames (4 in-game seconds) to reload
The ammunition is shared by both the missiles and the laser guns
Each ammunition takes 60 frames (4 in-game seconds) to reload
If the user is depowered or loses their Experimental Warpshop and all Warpnodes, the portal will close immediately.
